notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: G.d.S.B., F.B.d.A., R.F. and J.L.D. performed the experiments; R.A.S.C. and L.R. analyzed the chemical data; R.S.A. performed the nanoemulsion experiments; R.N.P.S. and J.C.T.C. analyzed the biological data; M.G.S. collected and identified the plant species; C.P.F. and V.L.P.P. conceived and designed the experiments.
